name: HoD 2009 ALBUM - SURGE KILL STEAL - £4.00
description:
HOD's second album "Surge Kill Steal" is 42.5 minutes of epic heavy metal thunder. 

Released - 3rd August 2009. Expect thrash, expect trad metal, expect the desire to DRINK AND BREAK SHIT!

Main edition - 12 page booket, full retail copy on indie records £4.00
White Cider Edition - CD with Card sleeve £2.00

name: SURGE KILL STEAL - WHITE CIDER EDITION - £2.00

Released - 3rd August. Expect thrash, expect trad metal, expect the desire to DRINK AND BREAK SHIT!
